attributes.action: Generating Revenue lncome for the UK economy
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Looking at the economy crisis in the UK, I  would like to suggest  you reconsider granting Amnesty/work permit to the applicants who have lived in the UK for at least 10 years, both legal and illegal to work in other to generate revenue income for the nation. I believe the world and the UK economy is not going to get better soon.

As suggested last year by one of your MPs, Brois Johnson, Major of London, l believe this is the best thing to do in our present economy crisis.

Thank you.

Yours faithfully

Donovan James
